refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: This tool is part of the samba 7 suite.

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.variablelist:
-h|--help
Show this help message and exit
--realm=REALM
Set the realm name
--simple-bind-dn=DN
DN to use for a simple bind
--password=PASSWORD
Password
-U USERNAME|--username=USERNAME
Username
-W WORKGROUP|--workgroup=WORKGROUP
Workgroup
-N|--no-pass
Don't ask for a password
-k KERBEROS|--kerberos=KERBEROS
Use Kerberos
--ipaddress=IPADDRESS
IP address of the server
&popt.common.samba.client;

refsect2.title: dbcheck
refsect2.para: Check the local AD database for errors.

refsect3.title: delegation add-service accountname principal [options]
refsect3.para: Add a service principal as msDS-AllowedToDelegateTo.

refsect3.title: delegation del-service accountname principal [options]
refsect3.para: Delete a service principal as msDS-AllowedToDelegateTo.

refsect3.title: delegation show accountname [options]
refsect3.para: Show the delegation setting of an account.

refsect3.title: dns add server zone name A|AAAA|PTR|CNAME|NS|MX|SRV|TXT data
dns delete server zone name A|AAAA|PTR|CNAME|NS|MX|SRV|TXT data
dns query server zone name A|AAAA|PTR|CNAME|NS|MX|SRV|TXT|ALL [options] data
dns update server zone name A|AAAA|PTR|CNAME|NS|MX|SRV|TXT olddata newdata
domain classicupgrade [options] classic_smb_conf
refsect3.para: Upgrade from Samba classic (NT4-like) database to Samba AD DC database.

refsect3.title: domain dcpromo dnsdomain [DC|RODC] [options]
refsect3.para: Promote an existing domain member or NT4 PDC to an AD DC.

refsect3.title: domain demote
refsect3.para: Demote ourselves from the role of domain controller.

refsect3.title: domain exportkeytab keytab [options]
refsect3.para: Dumps Kerberos keys of the domain into a keytab.

refsect3.title: domain info ip_address [options]
refsect3.para: Print basic info about a domain and the specified DC.

refsect3.title: domain join dnsdomain [DC|RODC|MEMBER|SUBDOMAIN] [options]
refsect3.para: Join a domain as either member or backup domain controller.

refsect3.title: domain level show|raise options [options]
refsect3.para: Show/raise domain and forest function levels.

refsect3.title: domain provision
refsect3.para: Promote an existing domain member or NT4 PDC to an AD DC.

refsect3.title: domain trust create DOMAIN options [options]
refsect3.para: Create a domain or forest trust.

refsect3.title: drs bind
refsect3.para: Show DRS capabilities of a server.

refsect3.title: drs options
refsect3.para: Query or change options for NTDS Settings object of a domain controller.

refsect3.title: drs replicate destination_DC source_DC NC [options]
refsect3.para: Replicate a naming context between two DCs.

refsect3.title: dsacl set
refsect3.para: Modify access list on a directory object.

refsect3.title: gpo dellink container_dn gpo [options]
refsect3.para: Delete GPO link from a container.

refsect3.title: gpo getinheritance container_dn [options]
refsect3.para: Get inheritance flag for a container.

refsect3.title: gpo getlink container_dn [options]
refsect3.para: List GPO Links for a container.

refsect3.title: gpo listcontainers gpo [options]
refsect3.para: List all linked containers for a GPO.

refsect3.title: gpo setinheritance container_dn block|inherit [options]
refsect3.para: Set inheritance flag on a container.

refsect3.title: gpo setlink container_dn gpo [options]
refsect3.para: Add or Update a GPO link to a container.

refsect3.title: group addmembers groupname members [options]
refsect3.para: Add members to an AD group.

refsect3.title: group listmembers groupname [options]
refsect3.para: List all members of the specified AD group.

refsect3.title: group removemembers groupname members [options]
refsect3.para: Remove members from the specified AD group.

refsect3.title: ntacl sysvolcheck
refsect3.para: Check sysvol ACLs match defaults (including correct ACLs on GPOs).

refsect3.title: ntacl sysvolreset
refsect3.para: Reset sysvol ACLs to defaults (including correct ACLs on GPOs).

refsect3.title: rodc preload SID|DN|accountname [options]
refsect3.para: Preload one account for an RODC.

refsect3.title: spn list user [options]
refsect3.para: List SPNs of a given user.

refsect2.title: testparm
refsect2.para: Check the syntax of the configuration file.

refsect2.title: time
refsect2.para: Retrieve the time on a server.

refsect3.title: user add username [password]
refsect3.para: Create a new user. Please note that this subcommand is deprecated and available for compatibility reasons only. Please use samba-tool user create instead.

refsect3.title: user create username [password]
refsect3.para: Create a new user in the Active Directory Domain.

refsect3.title: user password [options]
refsect3.para: Change password for an user account (the one provided in authentication).

refsect3.title: user setexpiry username [options]
refsect3.para: Set the expiration of an user account.

refsect3.title: user setpassword username [options]
refsect3.para: Sets or resets the password of an user account.

refsect3.title: user getpassword username [options]
refsect3.para: Gets the password of an user account.

refsect3.title: user syncpasswords --cache-ldb-initialize [options]
refsect3.para: Syncs the passwords of all user accounts, using an optional script.
Note that this command should run on a single domain controller only (typically the PDC-emulator).

refsect2.title: vampire [options] domain
refsect2.para: Join and synchronise a remote AD domain to the local server. Please note that samba-tool vampire is deprecated, please use samba-tool domain join instead.

refsect1.title: VERSION
refsect1.para: This man page is complete for version 4 of the Samba suite.

refsect1.title: AUTHOR
refsect1.para: The original Samba software and related utilities were created by Andrew Tridgell. Samba is now developed by the Samba Team as an Open Source project similar to the way the Linux kernel is developed.
The samba-tool manpage was written by Karolin Seeger.
